children.help: View lessons which are approved - search easily based on name, subject, grade, author, description and keywords. Use them to teach.
children.title: View approved

children.help: Create new lesson or worksheet. You can embed interactive pages like mutiple choice and match the following even in your lessons. This way you can make your class room interactive. The same lesson can be sent out as assignment for students to revise and self-learn.
children.title: Create new

children.help: Manage lessons and worksheets created by you. You can edit your lessons from here.

children.help: View all lessons available for review. Send comments and interact online with the author of the lesson or worksheet.

children.help: Manage all approved lessons. Disapprove the lessons.

children.help: View, export and import page categories. Every page in a learning app can be categorized with these pre-configured categories. These are helpful to structure information and also search for learning apps containing pages of given categories.
children.title: Page Categories

dashboard.help: It is very easy to create interative and engaging lessons. The lessons and worksheet can be used for different purposes: classroom teaching, assignments, student self-learning and revision at home.
dashboard.title: Content Corner

children.help: View all assignments you have sent out. See summary report and details. Once the student completes the assignment, results are updated in real time.
